thread.title: Tom Firbank

author: Tom Firbank
title: Tom Firbank
text: From first contact, having been put in touch with them by a family member, i have found tails.com to be helpful and efficient. I am not sure i really need the dogs name on the food bag but hey it arrives on time and lasts for the period it should. Slightly more expensive than the previous food my dog was on but their efficiency makes up for it. One less thing to think about in a busy busy world!
